quiz.question: ______ splutter
quiz.explanation: 溅射,引擎溅射。The old engine would splutter and cough before starting.旧引擎在启动前会溅射和咳嗽。

quiz.question: _____ mutter
quiz.explanation: 嘟囔,愤怒地嘟囔。He would mutter angrily under his breath about the situation.他会对情况在嘴里愤怒地嘟囔。

quiz.question: _____ nutter
quiz.explanation: 疯子,疯狂的疯子。That crazy nutter believes in the most bizarre conspiracy theories.那个疯狂的疯子相信最怪异的阴谋论。

quiz.question: ______ sputter
quiz.explanation: 喷溅,引擎喷溅。The dying engine would sputter its last before stopping completely.垂死的引擎会在完全停止前喷溅最后一次。

quiz.question: ______ stutter
quiz.explanation: 口吃,言语口吃。His speech stutter became worse when he was nervous.当他紧张时,他的言语口吃变得更糟。

quiz.question: _________ lifesaver
quiz.explanation: 救生圈,救生圈糖果。The colorful lifesaver candy had a hole in the middle.色彩鲜艳的救生圈糖果中间有一个洞。

quiz.question: _____ quaver
quiz.explanation: 颤抖,声音颤抖。Her voice would quaver with emotion during the farewell.她的声音会在告别时因情感而颤抖。

quiz.question: ____________ waver
quiz.explanation: 摇摆,股价摇摆。Stock prices would waver throughout the volatile trading day.股价会在动荡的交易日整天摇摆。

quiz.question: sever ____
quiz.explanation: 切断,切断关系。The company decided to sever ties with the corrupt supplier.公司决定切断与腐败供应商的关系。

quiz.question: ____ shiver
quiz.explanation: 颤抖,身体颤抖。Her body would shiver uncontrollably in the freezing cold.她的身体会在严寒中不受控制地颤抖。

quiz.question: ____ sliver
quiz.explanation: 碎片,木碎片。A sharp wood sliver lodged painfully in her finger.一块锋利的木碎片痛苦地卡在她的手指里。

quiz.question: ___ quiver
quiz.explanation: 箭袋,弓箭袋。The archer carried arrows in a leather bow quiver.弓箭手用皮革弓箭袋携带箭。

quiz.question: ______ salver
quiz.explanation: 托盘,银托盘。The butler presented drinks on a polished silver salver.管家在抛光的银托盘上呈上饮料。

quiz.question: ____ pushover
quiz.explanation: 容易对付的人,容易对付的人。The inexperienced team was an easy pushover for the champions.没有经验的球队对冠军来说是容易对付的人。

quiz.question: _____ ewer
quiz.explanation: 大口水罐,水大口水罐。The Victorian bedroom had a decorative water ewer and basin.维多利亚时代的卧室有装饰性的水大口水罐和盆。

quiz.question: cower __ ____
quiz.explanation: 畏缩,恐惧地畏缩。The terrified victims would cower in fear during the attack.受惊的受害者会在攻击期间恐惧地畏缩。

quiz.question: _____ glower
quiz.explanation: 怒视,愤怒的怒视。His angry glower intimidated everyone in the room.他愤怒的怒视吓倒了房间里的每个人。

quiz.question: overpower _____
quiz.explanation: 压倒,压倒敌人。The superior forces would quickly overpower enemy resistance.优势力量会迅速压倒敌人的抵抗。

quiz.question: _____ stargazer
quiz.explanation: 观星者,夜间观星者。The enthusiastic night stargazer studied constellations with a telescope.热情的夜间观星者用望远镜研究星座。

quiz.question: ____ __ tweezers
quiz.explanation: 镊子,一对镊子。She used a pair of tweezers to remove the splinter.她用一对镊子去除碎片。

quiz.question: ____ lair
quiz.explanation: 巢穴,狮子巢穴。The hunters discovered the lion's hidden lion lair in the cave.猎人在洞穴里发现了狮子隐藏的狮子巢穴。

quiz.question: _________ éclair
quiz.explanation: 泡芙,巧克力泡芙。The French bakery made delicious chocolate éclairs daily.法国面包店每天制作美味的巧克力泡芙。

quiz.question: __ disrepair
quiz.explanation: 失修,失修状态。The abandoned mansion fell into serious disrepair over decades.废弃的豪宅在几十年里陷入严重失修。

quiz.question: _____ heir
quiz.explanation: 继承人,法定继承人。The legal heir inherited the entire family estate.法定继承人继承了整个家族财产。

quiz.question: _______ whir
quiz.explanation: 呼呼声,机器呼呼声。The constant machine whir of the factory filled the air.工厂持续的机器呼呼声充满了空气。

quiz.question: _____ parlor
quiz.explanation: 客厅,酒店客厅。Guests gathered in the elegant hotel parlor for afternoon tea.客人们聚集在优雅的酒店客厅喝下午茶。

quiz.question: _____ clamor
quiz.explanation: 喧闹,人群喧闹。The crowd clamor grew louder as the celebrity arrived.当名人到达时,人群喧闹变得更响亮。

quiz.question: _____ tremor
quiz.explanation: 震动,地震震动。The minor earth tremor rattled windows but caused no damage.轻微的地震震动震动了窗户但没有造成损害。

quiz.question: _____ dishonor
quiz.explanation: 耻辱,带来耻辱。His actions would bring dishonor upon the entire family.他的行为会给整个家庭带来耻辱。

quiz.question: ____ moor
quiz.explanation: 荒野,荒野土地。The desolate moor land stretched for miles without trees.荒凉的荒野土地绵延数英里没有树木。

quiz.question: _____ __ torpor
quiz.explanation: 迟钝,迟钝状态。The hot summer afternoon induced a state of torpor in everyone.炎热的夏日午后在每个人身上引起了迟钝状态。

quiz.question: _______ stupor
quiz.explanation: 昏迷,醉酒昏迷。He lay in a drunken stupor unable to respond.他躺在醉酒昏迷中无法回应。

quiz.question: ______ furor
quiz.explanation: 轰动,公众轰动。The scandal created a public furor that lasted weeks.丑闻造成了持续数周的公众轰动。

quiz.question: ____ __ scissors
quiz.explanation: 剪刀,一把剪刀。She needed a sharp pair of scissors to cut the fabric.她需要一把锋利的剪刀来剪布料。

quiz.question: ____ prospector
quiz.explanation: 勘探者,黄金勘探者。The determined gold prospector searched for fortune in the mountains.坚定的黄金勘探者在山中寻找财富。

quiz.question: ___ constrictor
quiz.explanation: 蟒蛇,蟒蛇。The powerful boa constrictor squeezed its prey to death.强大的蟒蛇把猎物勒死。

quiz.question: ________ proprietor
quiz.explanation: 业主,物业业主。The property proprietor owned several commercial buildings downtown.物业业主在市中心拥有几栋商业建筑。

quiz.question: _______ captor
quiz.explanation: 俘获者,人质俘获者。The hostage captor demanded ransom for the prisoner's release.人质俘获者要求赎金释放囚犯。

quiz.question: _____ savor
quiz.explanation: 品味,甜品味。The chef wanted diners to savor the sweet flavors slowly.厨师希望食客慢慢品味甜味道。

quiz.question: ___ purr
quiz.explanation: 呼噜声,猫呼噜声。The contented cat would purr loudly when petted.满足的猫被抚摸时会大声呼噜。

quiz.question: ______ liqueur
quiz.explanation: 利口酒,樱桃利口酒。The dessert was flavored with sweet cherry liqueur.甜点用甜樱桃利口酒调味。

quiz.question: ______ slur
quiz.explanation: 诽谤,种族诽谤。The racist used an offensive racial slur during the argument.种族主义者在争论中使用了冒犯性的种族诽谤。

quiz.question: demur ________
quiz.explanation: 表示异议,礼貌地表示异议。She would demur politely when asked to work overtime.当被要求加班时,她会礼貌地表示异议。

quiz.question: ___ murmur
quiz.explanation: 低语,低低语。A low murmur of conversation filled the waiting room.低低语的谈话充满了候诊室。

quiz.question: scour _____
quiz.explanation: 擦洗,擦洗地板。She would scour floor thoroughly with strong cleanser.她会用强力清洁剂彻底擦洗地板。

quiz.question: _____ vigour
quiz.explanation: 活力,道德活力。The reformer pursued change with moral vigour and determination.改革者以道德活力和决心追求变革。

quiz.question: ____ lour
quiz.explanation: 阴沉,黑暗阴沉。Dark clouds would lour threateningly before the storm.黑暗的云会在暴风雨前威胁性地阴沉。

quiz.question: discolour ______
quiz.explanation: 使变色,使织物变色。Bleach can discolour fabric if used improperly.如果使用不当,漂白剂会使织物变色。

quiz.question: ______ clamour
quiz.explanation: 喧闹,公众喧闹。Public clamour for reform grew louder each day.公众对改革的喧闹每天都变得更响亮。

quiz.question: _____ demeanour
quiz.explanation: 举止,安静的举止。Her quiet demeanour concealed a sharp and analytical mind.她安静的举止隐藏了敏锐和分析性的头脑。

quiz.question: _____ misdemeanour
quiz.explanation: 轻罪,小轻罪。The teenager was charged with a petty misdemeanour offense.青少年被指控犯有小轻罪。

quiz.question: savour _______
quiz.explanation: 品味,品味胜利。The team would savour victory after years of defeat.球队会在多年失败后品味胜利。

quiz.question: _________ fervour
quiz.explanation: 热情,宗教热情。The congregation prayed with intense religious fervour.会众以强烈的宗教热情祈祷。

quiz.question: ___ vas
quiz.explanation: 输精管,输精管。The vas deferens transports sperm during reproduction.输精管在生殖期间运输精子。

quiz.question: _____ cobwebs
quiz.explanation: 蜘蛛网,灰尘蜘蛛网。Dusty cobwebs hung from every corner of the attic.灰尘蜘蛛网挂在阁楼的每个角落。

quiz.question: ________ soapsuds
quiz.explanation: 肥皂泡,肥皂泡沫。The washing machine overflowed with soapsuds foam everywhere.洗衣机到处都是肥皂泡沫溢出。

quiz.question: ______ hosepipes
quiz.explanation: 水管,橡胶水管。The gardener connected rubber hosepipes to water the lawn.园丁连接橡胶水管浇灌草坪。

quiz.question: ______ unawares
quiz.explanation: 出其不意,出其不意地抓住。The burglar was caught unawares by the security guard.窃贼被保安出其不意地抓住。

quiz.question: ____ poufs
quiz.explanation: 蓬松发型,头发蓬松发型。The 1980s featured dramatic hair poufs and big styles.1980年代以戏剧性的头发蓬松发型和大造型为特色。

quiz.question: oohs ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 惊叹,惊叹声。The audience responded with oohs and aahs at the fireworks.观众对烟花发出惊叹声。

quiz.question: ______ dais
quiz.explanation: 讲台,升高的讲台。The speaker stood on a raised dais addressing the assembly.演讲者站在升高的讲台上向大会讲话。

quiz.question: ________ haggis
quiz.explanation: 羊杂碎布丁,苏格兰羊杂碎布丁。Traditional Scottish haggis is served on Burns Night.传统的苏格兰羊杂碎布丁在彭斯之夜供应。

quiz.question: _______ pterodactyls
quiz.explanation: 翼龙,飞翼龙。Flying pterodactyls soared through prehistoric skies millions of years ago.飞翼龙数百万年前在史前天空中翱翔。

quiz.question: _____ summons
quiz.explanation: 传票,法院传票。He received a court summons to appear as a witness.他收到了作为证人出庭的法院传票。

quiz.question: __ twos
quiz.explanation: 成对,成对地。The students lined up in twos for the field trip.学生们为实地考察成对排队。

quiz.question: ______ carcass
quiz.explanation: 尸体,动物尸体。Vultures circled above the dead animal carcass in the desert.秃鹫在沙漠中死去的动物尸体上空盘旋。

quiz.question: _______ wineglass
quiz.explanation: 酒杯,水晶酒杯。The elegant crystal wineglass sparkled in the candlelight.优雅的水晶酒杯在烛光中闪闪发光。

quiz.question: amass ______
quiz.explanation: 积累,积累财富。The businessman worked tirelessly to amass wealth and power.商人不知疲倦地工作以积累财富和权力。

quiz.question: _______ trespass
quiz.explanation: 侵入,非法侵入。The signs warned against illegal trespass on private property.标志警告不要非法侵入私人财产。

quiz.question: _________ knotgrass
quiz.explanation: 萹蓄,萹蓄杂草。The persistent knotgrass weed invaded the garden beds.顽固的萹蓄杂草侵入了花园床。

quiz.question: _________ mirthless
quiz.explanation: 无趣的,无趣的笑。His mirthless laugh showed no genuine amusement.他无趣的笑没有显示出真正的愉悦。

quiz.question: ________ pitiless
quiz.explanation: 无情的,无情的命运。The victims suffered under a pitiless fate beyond control.受害者在无法控制的无情命运下受苦。

quiz.question: ________ gormless
quiz.explanation: 愚蠢的,愚蠢的傻瓜。The gormless fool couldn't understand simple instructions.愚蠢的傻瓜无法理解简单的指示。

quiz.question: ________ tactless
quiz.explanation: 不得体的,不得体的评论。Her tactless remark offended everyone at the dinner party.她不得体的评论冒犯了晚宴上的每个人。

quiz.question: __________ flightless
quiz.explanation: 不会飞的,不会飞的鸟。The penguin is a flightless bird adapted for swimming.企鹅是适应游泳的不会飞的鸟。

quiz.question: ___________ thoughtless
quiz.explanation: 轻率的,轻率的行为。His thoughtless act hurt the feelings of others.他轻率的行为伤害了他人的感情。

quiz.question: _________ fruitless
quiz.explanation: 徒劳的,徒劳的尝试。After many fruitless attempts, they finally abandoned the project.在许多徒劳的尝试之后,他们最终放弃了项目。

quiz.question: _________ heartless
quiz.explanation: 无情的,无情的犯罪。The heartless crime shocked the entire community.无情的犯罪震惊了整个社区。

quiz.question: ________ likeness
quiz.explanation: 相似,惊人的相似。The portrait captured a striking likeness of the subject.肖像捕捉了主题惊人的相似。

quiz.question: _____ vileness
quiz.explanation: 邪恶,纯粹的邪恶。The sheer vileness of the act horrified witnesses.行为纯粹的邪恶使目击者感到恐惧。

quiz.question: ______________ vindictiveness
quiz.explanation: 报复性,报复性精神。Her vindictiveness spirit led to years of bitter feuding.她的报复性精神导致了多年的激烈争执。

quiz.question: _____________ attentiveness
quiz.explanation: 专注,对细节的专注。The artist's attentiveness to detail created masterpieces.艺术家对细节的专注创造了杰作。

quiz.question: _____ __ nothingness
quiz.explanation: 虚无,虚无状态。Meditation can lead to a peaceful state of nothingness.冥想可以导致平静的虚无状态。

quiz.question: ________ smugness
quiz.explanation: 自鸣得意,自鸣得意的态度。His smugness attitude irritated colleagues after his promotion.他升职后自鸣得意的态度激怒了同事。

quiz.question: __________ bloodiness
quiz.explanation: 血腥,战争的血腥。Historical accounts describe the bloodiness of war in detail.历史记载详细描述了战争的血腥。

quiz.question: ____ airiness
quiz.explanation: 轻盈,轻盈的轻盈。The airy airiness of the fabric made it perfect for summer.织物轻盈的轻盈使其非常适合夏天。

quiz.question: __________ drowsiness
quiz.explanation: 困倦,药物引起的困倦。The drowsiness from medicine made driving dangerous.药物引起的困倦使驾驶变得危险。

quiz.question: __________ jauntiness
quiz.explanation: 轻快,轻快的步伐。He walked with a jauntiness that showed his confidence.他以显示自信的轻快步伐行走。

quiz.question: __________ frostiness
quiz.explanation: 冷淡,冷淡的语气。The frostiness tone in her voice indicated displeasure.她声音中的冷淡语气表明不悦。

quiz.question: ________ fullness
quiz.explanation: 充实,时间的充实。In the fullness of time, all truths will be revealed.在时间的充实中,所有真相都将被揭示。

quiz.question: ____________ truthfulness
quiz.explanation: 真实性,真实性价值。Parents should teach children to value truthfulness above all.父母应该教孩子们最重视真实性价值。

quiz.question: ______________ thoughtfulness
quiz.explanation: 体贴,体贴的姿态。The thoughtfulness gesture of flowers brightened her day.体贴的花姿态照亮了她的一天。

quiz.question: __________ bitterness
quiz.explanation: 痛苦,失败的痛苦。The team felt the bitterness of defeat after losing.球队在失败后感到失败的痛苦。

quiz.question: _________ lightness
quiz.explanation: 轻盈,触摸的轻盈。The pianist performed with remarkable lightness of touch.钢琴家以显著的触摸轻盈演奏。

quiz.question: ______ caress
quiz.explanation: 爱抚,温柔的爱抚。A gentle caress on the cheek showed her affection.脸颊上温柔的爱抚显示了她的爱意。

quiz.question: undress _______
quiz.explanation: 脱衣服,快速脱衣服。The doctor asked the patient to undress quickly for examination.医生要求病人快速脱衣服进行检查。

quiz.question: ____ sorceress
quiz.explanation: 女巫,邪恶的女巫。The evil sorceress cast wicked spells on innocent villagers.邪恶的女巫对无辜的村民施下邪恶的咒语。

quiz.question: ______ headmistress
quiz.explanation: 女校长,严格的女校长。The strict headmistress enforced rules firmly at the school.严格的女校长在学校严格执行规则。

quiz.question: obsess ____
quiz.explanation: 痴迷,痴迷于。Don't obsess over small details that don't matter.不要痴迷于无关紧要的小细节。

quiz.question: ________ giantess
quiz.explanation: 女巨人,女巨人形象。The fairy tale featured a fearsome giantess figure.童话故事以可怕的女巨人形象为特色。
